description: Describes one or more flow logs. To view the published flow log records, you must view the log destination. For example, the CloudWatch Logs log group, the Amazon S3 bucket, or the Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. deliver-log-status - The status of the logs delivery ( SUCCESS | FAILED). log-destination-type - The type of destination for the flow log data ( cloud-watch-logs | s3 | kinesis-data-firehose). flow-log-id - The ID of the flow log. log-group-name - The name of the log group. resource-id - The ID of the VPC, subnet, or network interface. traffic-type - The type of traffic ( ACCEPT | REJECT | ALL). tag:<key> - The key/value combination of a tag assigned to the resource. Use the tag key in the filter name and the tag value as the filter value. For example, to find all resources that have a tag with the key Owner and the value TeamA, specify tag:Owner for the filter name and TeamA for the filter value. tag-key - The key of a tag assigned to the resource. Use this filter to find all resources assigned a tag with a specific key, regardless of the tag value. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

parameters.name: FlowLogIds
parameters.description: One or more flow log IDs. Constraint: Maximum of 1000 flow log IDs. (string) ---

nested_items.name: FlowLogs
nested_items.description: Information about the flow logs.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the flow log was created.

nested_items.name: DeliverLogsErrorMessage
nested_items.description: Information about the error that occurred. Rate limited indicates that CloudWatch Logs throttling has been applied for one or more network interfaces, or that you've reached the limit on the number of log groups that you can create. Access error indicates that the IAM role associated with the flow log does not have sufficient permissions to publish to CloudWatch Logs. Unknown error indicates an internal error.

nested_items.name: DeliverLogsPermissionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role allows the service to publish logs to CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: DeliverCrossAccountRole
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that allows the service to publish flow logs across accounts.

nested_items.name: DeliverLogsStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the logs delivery ( SUCCESS | FAILED).

nested_items.name: FlowLogId
nested_items.description: The ID of the flow log.

nested_items.name: FlowLogStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the flow log ( ACTIVE).

nested_items.name: LogGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the flow log group.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource being monitored.

nested_items.name: TrafficType
nested_items.description: The type of traffic captured for the flow log.

nested_items.name: LogDestinationType
nested_items.description: The type of destination for the flow log data.

nested_items.name: LogDestination
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination for the flow log data.

nested_items.name: LogFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the flow log record.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags for the flow log.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: MaxAggregationInterval
nested_items.description: The maximum interval of time, in seconds, during which a flow of packets is captured and aggregated into a flow log record.

nested_items.name: DestinationOptions
nested_items.description: The destination options.

nested_items.name: FileFormat
nested_items.description: The format for the flow log.

nested_items.name: HiveCompatiblePartitions
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to use Hive-compatible prefixes for flow logs stored in Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: PerHourPartition
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to partition the flow log per hour.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to request the next page of items. This value is null when there are no more items to return.
